reviews.title: Welsh Treasure
reviews.text: I stayed at the Wye Valley Hotel this past summer and had a marvelous time. The room was comfortable and had a fully equipped bathroom. The owners were very friendly and helpful. The family run restaurant serves excellent food and drink. Tintern is a lovely little town on the banks of the Wye with the Abbey as its showcase and many hiking trails in the area. I loved the town and the hotel. You can get a bus into Chepstow right across the street from the hotel. I highly recommend this the Wye Valley Hotel.
